relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as indicated by the fact that they return to the Great Hall together.
Fleur and Roger Davies have disappeared together, suggesting that they may be acquaintances or friends.
Parvati is socializing with the Beauxbatons boys, indicating that she may know them or be friendly with them.
Padma is also socializing with the Beauxbatons boys, suggesting that she may know them or be friendly with them.
Hermione and Krum are dancing together, indicating that they may have a romantic interest in each other.
